tool_description: "PokedexAPI" is a comprehensive and user-friendly API that provides a wealth of information about Pokémon creatures from the popular Pokémon universe. With a vast collection of endpoints, it offers detailed data on individual Pokémon species, including their names, types, abilities, characteristics, and much more. Whether you're a developer building Pokémon-related applications or a fan seeking to explore the world of Pokémon, "PokedexAPI" is your go-to resource for accessing accurate and up-...
